author: psmith
msg: added mini-toolbar to the LoggerName tree panel, with expansion
button.
added support for CTRL+Dbl Click to auto-expand all child nodes.
Tooltip for each node in the tree is the complete dotted package name

author: psmith
msg: added the builder code when the user selects the
Simple Socket option when no receivers are defined.
A new SocketReceiver is created with the chosen port
and activated via the PluginRegistry.

author: psmith
msg: added another option to the No Receiver warning panel.
Now the user is presented with an option to create a
simple Socket Receiver on one of the standard ports.
This is the most likely option for new Chainsaw users,
and is a more user friendly option then having to specify
it via configs, or even create one via the GUI.
Very handy for testing purposes too.

author: psmith
msg: Modified root tree node to say "Root Logger" (more logical).
Removed commented out code.

author: psmith
msg: Rather than encapsulate the Logger name tree in just
a tree component, encapsulate it in a Panel so
we can add some other functionality similar
to the way the Receiver panel works (a mini-toolbar etc).
